abstract.p: Photos of gold outfits in New York City (On the Streets column) (M)

block.p: Sparkling gold for day or evening, a whole range of sandy beiges and dark brooding bronzes make up the first color palette to emerge for fall, raising the question: Could they be the new black? These sunset colors signal autumn in New York. Shown here are women who captured the look in all its variations, in clothes that echo popular sporty and classic looks. For many, it's in the mix of fabrics and textures: far left, a suede skirt, a finely knitted sweater and a fur bag in the same tones; far right, top and bottom, gold leather coats, jackets and skirts. For others, gold is an accent accessory in shoes, bags and belts. All this shine seems to put a positive spin on dressing.
